summary: This movie is about the stern gangster customs of one of the Russian provincial cities in the mid-90s . And you could expect either a stupid game of blind man's buffets or a truly bloody showdown with the stacks of "bluffers".
cast: Aleksey Panin|Dmitriy Dyuzhev|Nikita Mikhalkov|Sergey Makovetskiy|Anatoliy Zhuravlyov|Grigoriy Siyatvinda|Viktor Sukhorukov|Aleksey Serebryakov|Garik Sukachyov|Andrey Panin|Kirill Pirogov|Yuriy Stepanov|Renata Litvinova|Zhanna Bolotova|Tatyana Dogileva|Dmitriy Pevtsov|Andrey Krasko|Aleksandr Bashirov|Viktor Bychkov|Andrey Merzlikin|Sergei Glazunov|Vladik Tolochko|Evgeniy Kosyrev|Mikhail Smolyakov|Aleksandr Gerber|Evgeniy Morozov|Pavel Ivanov|Aleksei Sheludyakov|Oleg Ossayenko|Dmitry Aksyonov|Stepan Beketov|Georgiy Chilingarashvili|Yuriy Galtsev|Yuri Kazakov|Larisa Loginova|Aleksandra Moshkova|Aleksandr Ovchinnikov|Nikolay Ponomaryov|Maksim Ukhanov
title: Zhmurki
